message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its exceptional features and unparalleled quality, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. I am confident it will bring significant value to your business or personal endeavors. For a limited time, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $2000000. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this opportunity.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget allows for a lower price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
